author: COMSOL
description: A plate consisting of two layers (a coating and a substrate layer) is stress and strain free at 800°C. The temperature of the plate is reduced to 150°C, which induces thermal stresses. A third layer, the carrier layer, is then activated in a stress-free state. The temperature is finally reduced to 20°C.
label: layered_plate.mph
name: root

settings.description: Temperature when the coating/substrate is epoxied to the carrier
settings.name: Tepoxying

settings.description: Show or hide all physics symbols
settings.name: physicsSymbolButtons
text
settings.value: Changes made to these settings only take effect when the default solver is generated.

settings.description: Avoid inverted elements by curving interior domain elements
settings.name: curvedinterior

description: Initial values of variables solved for
settings.name: useinitsol

description: Values of variables not solved for
settings.name: usesol

settings.description: Split complex variables in real and imaginary parts
settings.name: splitcomplex

settings.description: Use thread scheduling for matrix assembly
settings.name: optthread

settings.description: Use static distribution of assembly blocks
settings.name: statblockdistr

settings.description: Allow complex-valued output from functions with real input
settings.name: complexfun

settings.description: Stop when undefined mathematical operation is detected
settings.name: matherr

settings.description: Check for undefined numerical values after each operation
settings.name: checkmatherr

settings.description: Drop tolerance for local matrix contributions
settings.name: assemtol

settings.description: Use initial damping factor for all parameter steps
settings.name: initdampall

settings.description: Update automatic scale factors in weights
settings.name: updweightsauto

settings.description: Store solution for all intermediate study steps
settings.name: storeSol

settings.description: Generate default plots for intermediately stored solutions
settings.name: genIntermediatePlots

settings.description: Plot the location of undefined values
settings.name: plotUndefVals

settings.description: Recompute all plot data after solving
settings.name: autoregenerateplot

settings.description: Reevaluate all evaluation groups after solving
settings.name: autoregenerateevalgroups

settings.description: Ask to save application when closing
settings.name: asktosave

title: Thermal Stresses in a Layered Plate
